title: Ticket #2978: Update documentation for 7.6, it has a typo in section 3.13.9.9
description: The documentation for v7.6 still refers to the old nomenclature for dynamic slots as being slotx.y instead of slotx_y. This behavior was changed in version v070402 but the documentation does not reflect the current behavior. Specifically these two sentences: "The portion of the slot that is utilized is referred to as Slot1.1, and after allocation, the slot advertises that it has the following resources still available:" "As each new job is allocated to Slot1, it breaks into Slot1.1, Slot1.2, etc., until the entire set of available resources have been consumed by jobs."
remarks:
2012-May-14 15:23:18 by smoler:
Thanks for finding and pointing out this typo. Seems a developer in 2010 simply left a remark that the change needed a version history item in #1107, and then resolved the ticket without the version history item or the associated change to the documentation.

The corrected documentation will be in the 7.8.1 manual, within section 3.12.8.9.
check_ins: 2012-May-14 15:14   Check-in [32044]: Dynamic slots got changed to use an underscore in the identification of a slot long ago. ===GT=== #2978 (By Karen Miller )
creator: braggepj
